name: Spycast
description:
A cooperative Chrome Cast game where players work together to catch the spy.

4 players participate in the game: 3 trying to catch the invisible spy and one spy trying to leak information from at least 3 of the 5 corporations in the game. For the spy to be able to leak the information, he has to get on the red tiles to steal the information and then get back to his safe house to leak it.

A game by Esben Kran Christensen, Frederik Schmidt Knudsen, Mathias Fynbo og Mikkel Stenkjær Hansen.
